column2: Plot to steal an equipped artifact from the target through your agents.
column3: Complotez pour voler un artefact equipe de la cible.

column2: Spread false rumors to destroy a rival's reputation across the realm.
column3: Repandez de fausses rumeurs pour detruire la reputation d'un rival.

column2: Turn a ruler's vassals against them through secret agitation.
column3: Retournez les vassaux d'un dirigeant contre lui.

column2: Gather compromising information on a target for leverage.
column3: Rassemblez des informations compromettantes sur une cible.

column2: Commission a slow-acting poison for a discreet elimination.
column3: Commandez un poison a action lente pour une elimination discrete.

column2: Abduct a character for ransom or political leverage.
column3: Enlevez un personnage pour une rancon ou un avantage politique.

column2: Perform forbidden magic against a rival ruler. Only for magic classes.
column3: Effectuez un rituel magique interdit contre un rival. Classes magiques seulement.

column2: Set up an illicit trade network for ongoing income. Requires discretion.
column3: Creez un reseau de commerce illicite pour des revenus continus.

column2: Plot to overthrow your liege and seize power for yourself.
column3: Complotez pour renverser votre suzerain et prendre le pouvoir.

column2: Have a private conversation with this person.
column3: Avoir une discussion privee avec cette personne.

column2: Your agents begin establishing smuggling routes...
column3: Vos agents commencent a etablir des routes de contrebande...

column2: You begin secretly preparing your seizure of power...
column3: Vous commencez a preparer secretement votre prise de pouvoir...

column2: Your agents have identified the target's most prized artifact. They await your signal to begin the operation.
column3: Vos agents ont identifie l'artefact le plus precieux de la cible. Ils attendent votre signal.

column2: Your agents successfully infiltrated and extracted the artifact without being detected. A masterful operation.
column3: Vos agents ont reussi a infiltrer et extraire l'artefact sans etre detectes.

column2: Your agents couldn't reach the artifact but managed to pocket some gold during the infiltration.
column3: Vos agents n'ont pas pu atteindre l'artefact mais ont recupere de l'or.
Au moins on a quelque chose

column2: Your agents were discovered during the operation. Your involvement is now known throughout the realm.
column3: Vos agents ont ete decouverts. Votre implication est maintenant connue.

column2: Your network of informants begins spreading carefully crafted lies about the target.
column3: Votre reseau d'informateurs commence a repandre des mensonges soigneusement elabores.

column2: Let the whispers do their work
column3: Laissons les murmures faire leur oeuvre

column2: The false rumors have spread like wildfire. The target's reputation lies in ruins.
column3: Les fausses rumeurs se sont propagees comme une trainee de poudre.

column2: Some rumors circulate but fail to gain real traction. Still, you learned useful skills.
column3: Quelques rumeurs circulent mais ne prennent pas vraiment.

column2: The false rumors have been traced back to you. Now everyone knows you as a liar and schemer.
column3: Les fausses rumeurs ont ete retracees jusqu'a vous.

column2: I should have been more careful
Your operatives infiltrate the target realm, whispering promises of freedom to disgruntled vassals.
column3: Vos agents infiltrent le royaume cible, murmurant des promesses de liberte.
Semez les graines de la discorde

column2: Your efforts bear fruit as multiple vassals rise against their overlord in open revolt!
column3: Vos efforts portent leurs fruits alors que plusieurs vassaux se revolent!

column2: There is unrest in the target realm but no outright rebellion. The seeds are planted.
column3: Il y a de l'agitation mais pas de rebellion ouverte.

column2: Your involvement in the failed rebellion has been exposed. Diplomatic consequences will follow.
column3: Votre implication dans la rebellion echouee a ete exposee.
Nous avons cree un puissant ennemi

column2: Your spies begin investigating the target's private life, searching for any compromising information.
column3: Vos espions enquetent sur la vie privee de la cible.

column2: Your agents have uncovered damning evidence. The target is now in your power.
column3: Vos agents ont decouvert des preuves accablantes.

column2: Your investigation yielded some minor dirt but nothing truly devastating.
column3: Votre enquete a revele quelques details mineurs mais rien de devastateur.

column2: In investigating the target, your agents accidentally revealed YOUR secrets. Now they have leverage on you.
column3: En enquetant, vos agents ont accidentellement revele VOS secrets.

column2: A vial of slow-acting poison has been crafted. Your agents move to deliver it.
column3: Une fiole de poison a action lente a ete preparee.

column2: The poison took effect. The target has fallen ill and perished. No one suspects your involvement.
column3: Le poison a fait effet. La cible est tombee malade et a peri.

column2: The poison took partial effect. The target survived but is significantly weakened.
column3: Le poison n'a fait qu'un effet partiel.

column2: A loyal servant tasted the poison before it reached the target. Your plot is exposed.
column3: Un serviteur loyal a goute le poison avant qu'il n'atteigne la cible.

column2: In a terrible irony, you accidentally exposed yourself to the poison during preparation.
column3: Par une terrible ironie, vous vous etes accidentellement expose au poison.

column2: Your agents have scouted the target's movements. They are ready to strike.
column3: Vos agents ont etudie les deplacements de la cible.

column2: Your agents successfully abducted the target. They are now your prisoner.
column3: Vos agents ont reussi a enlever la cible.

column2: The target managed to escape your agents. The operation was a costly failure.
column3: La cible a reussi a echapper a vos agents.

column2: Your own agents were caught and imprisoned. They will likely reveal your involvement.
column3: Vos propres agents ont ete captures et emprisonnes.

column2: You gather the forbidden components and begin the dark ritual, channeling arcane energies against your target.
column3: Vous rassemblez les composants interdits et commencez le rituel sombre.

column2: The ritual succeeds beyond expectations. A terrible curse falls upon your target's lands and people.
column3: Le rituel depasse les attentes. Une terrible malediction s'abat sur les terres de votre cible.

column2: They will suffer for crossing me
The ritual produced some effect but not the devastating curse you hoped for.
column3: Le rituel a produit un certain effet mais pas la malediction devastatrice esperee.

column2: The magic was not strong enough
column3: La magie n'etait pas assez puissante

column2: The dark energies spiraled out of control and turned against you. Your mind and body are scarred.
column3: Les energies sombres ont echappe a tout controle.

column2: The ritual attracted the attention of malevolent entities. They punished your hubris severely.
column3: Le rituel a attire l'attention d'entites malveillantes.

column2: I should never have tried this
Your agents scout hidden paths and corrupt border guards to establish smuggling routes.
column3: Vos agents repaient des chemins caches et corrompent des gardes-frontieres.

column2: A profitable smuggling operation is now running under your realm. Gold flows in regularly.
column3: Un reseau de contrebande profitable fonctionne maintenant sous votre royaume.

column2: Only a small smuggling operation could be established. It provides modest income.
column3: Seule une petite operation de contrebande a pu etre etablie.

column2: Your smuggling operation was discovered and shut down. Your reputation takes a hit.
column3: Votre operation de contrebande a ete decouverte et demantelee.

column2: You secretly contact like-minded nobles and military commanders, planning the overthrow.
column3: Vous contactez secretement des nobles et des commandants militaires allies.

column2: Your forces seize the capital! The old regime falls and you take power!
column3: Vos forces s'emparent de la capitale! L'ancien regime tombe!

column2: The coup was not entirely successful, but your show of force extracted significant concessions.
column3: Le coup n'a pas entierement reussi, mais votre demonstration de force a extrait des concessions.

column2: Your plot was discovered before you could act. The retaliation is swift and brutal.
column3: Votre complot a ete decouvert avant que vous ne puissiez agir.
